Name: debarking, softwood, in forest | sawlog and veneer log, softwood, debarked, measured as solid wood | EN15804GD, U
Category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/02:Forestry and logging/022:Logging/0220:Logging
Description: The process refers to a tractor driven process, i.e. a mechanical and mobile debarking process. Softwood is usually debarked in the forest with movable disbarkers. ;;The amount of bark, based on the total volume of the stem with bark is about 8 to 15% for spruce (Kollmann et al., 1975 and Sell, 1997).;References:;Kollmann F. F. P., Kuenzi E. W. and Stamm A. J. (1975) Principles of Wood Science and Technology. Springer-Verl., Berlin, Heidelberg, New York.;;Sell J. (1997) Eigenschaften und Kenngrössen von Holzarten. 4. überarbeitete und erweiterte Aufl. Edition. Lig-num, Baufachverl. AG Zürich, Dietikon.
